thread.title: Jackie Chan Searches for Lost Treasure in New Action-Comedy ‘Kung-Fu Yoga’
thread.title_full: Jackie Chan Searches for Lost Treasure in New Action-Comedy ‘Kung-Fu Yoga’

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Jackie Chan Searches for Lost Treasure in New Action-Comedy ‘Kung-Fu Yoga’
text:
While his new action-comedy Railroad Tigers premieres in theaters this week, here we get a look at yet another new film starring martial arts legend Jackie Chan. Kung-Fu Yoga in turn finds Chan playing a Chinese archeology professor named Jack, as he then teams up with a beautiful Indian professor named Ashmita (Dishi Patani) and her assistant Kyra (Amyra Dastur) with hopes of finding lost Magadha treasure.
Along the way, the trio will be chased by a national army, maneuver throughout Dubai in some fast rides, and venture to some of the most exotic places known to man.
You can get your first look at Kung-Fu Yoga above, as the action-comedy film is scheduled to land in theaters in China on January 28.
